name: openspeedtest
tagline: A self-hosted browser based internet speed test
description: OpenSpeedTest is a self-hosted internet speed test tool with a responsive web interface. It measures download, upload, and latency through your browser without plugins or dependencies.

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Measure internet download and upload speeds directly through your web browser without plugins

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Test network latency and ping times to assess connection quality and responsiveness

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own speed test server for internal network testing and bandwidth monitoring

features.title: Responsive Interface
features.description: Clean, mobile-friendly web interface that works across all devices and screen sizes

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Store and compare speed test results over time to track network performance trends
